metadata.title: CVE-2020-36401 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
mruby 2.1.2 has a double free in mrb_default_allocf (called from mrb_freeand obj_free).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36401` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mruby - 3.0.0-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mruby package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.0-4').
